archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ADV005 Conduct a denial of service (DoS) attack
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The threat deliberately impairs the availability or performance of an organisation’s information system(s).
Assessment guidance: At lower levels of threat strength, the threat is likely to use relatively unsophisticated techniques, involving the use of publicly available tools, a single source/host and limited network bandwidth.
At higher levels of threat strength, the threat could employ more sophisticated techniques, involving: ԉ the development and/or use of custom tools ԉ a large number of information systems in different locations ԉ a large amount of network bandwidth ԉ interfering with wireless communications (e.g. Wi-Fi or GSM/CDMA) so as to impede or prevent communications from reaching intended recipients.
